Package eu.monnetproject.translation

Interfaces to the statistical & semantic translation system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlignedPhraseTableEntry
    A phrase table entry with alignment objects
    Chunk
    A section of a source label
    ChunkList
    A list of chunks
    Decoder
    A decoder, which composes a set of candidate phrase translations to a translation
    DecoderFactory
    Factory for creating decoders
    DecoderWeights
    Weights on the features of a decoder
    Feature
    A feature score for a single translation
    Label
    A label for the translation system
    LanguageModel
    A language model capable of estimating the probability of a phrase in a language
    LanguageModelFactory
    A factor for creating language models
    OntologyTranslator
    A translator of ontologies
    PhraseTable<Entry extends PhraseTableEntry>
    A table of candidate translation fragments
    PhraseTableEntry
    A single entry in a phrase table
    TokenizedLabel
    A label with a tokenization
    Translation
    A translation result of the system
    TranslationFeaturizer
    A component for modifying or augmenting the features of the phrase table
    TranslationFeaturizerFactory
    A factory for creating featurizers
    TranslationPhraseChunker
    A chunker, a system capable of breaking a complex label into subcomponents
    TranslationPhraseChunkerFactory
    A factory for creating a chunker
    TranslationRanker
    A ranker capable of giving a score for a translation
    TranslationRankerFactory
    A factory for creating translation rankers
    TranslationSource
    A source of translations.
    TranslationSourceFactory
    A factory for creating translation sources
